links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
The Lord of the Rings (film series)
Valedictory Address to the University of Oxford

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[10 January|10]]''' - Screenwriter [[Fran Walsh]] is born.
* '''[[12 January|12]]''' - [[Simon Tolkien]] is born.
==February==
* '''[[4 February|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 214a]].
* '''[[5 February|5]]''' - [[Peter Emshwiller]], who would provide the voice of [[Thranduil]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'', is born.
==March==
* '''[[4 March|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 214b]].
* '''[[5 March|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to William Ready (5 March 1959)|a letter to William Ready]].
* '''[[20 March|20]]''' - Game designer [[Anders Blixt]] is born.
==April==
* '''[[17 April|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 215]].
* '''[[17 April|17]]''' - [[Sean Bean]], who would play [[Boromir]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], is born.
==May==
* '''[[26 May|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Miss Robinson|a letter to Miss Robinson]].
* '''[[30 May|30]]''' - Swedish-French director [[Charlotte Brändström]] is born.
==June==
* '''[[5 June|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] delivers the [[Valedictory Address to the University of Oxford]].
==July==
* '''[[16 July|16]]''' - [[Bob Joles]], who would voice [[Gimli]], [[Treebeard]] and [[Dáin Ironfoot]] in various [[Electronic Arts|EA]] video games, is born.
==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] serves the first Mass of [[Robert Murray]].
* '''[[4 August|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 215a]].
* '''[[12 August|12]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 216]].
==September==
* '''[[10 September|10]]''' - Actor [[Jim Meskimen]] is born.
* '''[[11 September|11]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[letter 217]].
==October==
* '''[[9 October|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 218]].
* '''[[15 October|15]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 220]].
* '''[[16 October|16]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[letter 219]].
==November==
* '''[[2 November|2]]''' - Actor [[Peter Mullan]] is born.
* '''[[8 November|8]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 220a]].
* '''[[24 November|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 221]].
* '''?'''' - The poem "[[The Passing of the Elven-kind]]" by Ted Johnstone, the oldest known published [[fanfiction|Tolkien fan faction]], is published.
==December==
* '''[[9 December|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 222]].
* '''[[29 December|29]]''' - [[Brian Sergent]], who would play [[Ted Sandyman]] in the extended edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', is born.
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski (December 1959)|a letter to Przemyslaw Mroczkowski]].
==?==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] retires from the Merton professorship at the [[University of Oxford]].
* '''?''' - Author [[Douglas A. Anderson]] is born.
* '''?''' - Science fiction scholar [[Michael Martinez]] is born.
* '''?''' - Actor [[Harry Sinclair]] is born.

{{Years|1956|1957|1958|1959|1960|1961|1962|}}
